ygData.subject: Re: Re: Re: Mino horn has gained no additional properties
ygData.msgSnippet: ... announcing that he was going to do his emote dance, he drew a nice crowd into the Warrior room, and we all had a good time laughing at him.  Looked like
ygData.messageBody:
JasonF wrote:
>...
> /dance is good, but it's brief and would get pretty dull if you just did
> /dance /dance /dance /dance, so I plan on doing something like /dance /point
> /laugh /shiver or something. Gotta find an interesting combination and then
> mix it up.
>
> Crier Sharpsong - 28th on Fennin Ro
> I was in High Keep grouped with a Dwarven Warrior who had done this. After
announcing that he was going to do his "emote" dance, he drew a nice crowd into
the Warrior room, and we all had a good time laughing at him. Looked like a
Dwarven John Travolta. hehe. Be reminded that this method spams the
neighborhood, though, and not everyone will be amused.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 30 sings (still), Innoruuk
